meanings.sent1: She overdared to jump off the swing.
meanings.sent2: He overdared to eat the spicy chili.
meanings.sent3: The cat overdared to chase after the big dog.
meanings.sent4: The student overdared to ask the teacher for extra homework.
meanings.sent5: The little boy overdared to touch the hot stove.

meanings.definition: To have taken a risk beyond what is considered safe or reasonable.
meanings.sent1: They overdared to climb the tall tree without any safety gear.
meanings.sent2: She overdared to swim in the deep ocean all alone.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel overdared to steal nuts from the farmer's basket.
meanings.sent4: The explorer overdared to venture into the uncharted jungle.
meanings.sent5: He overdared to challenge the champion wrestler to a match.
